name: Bug, Not a Feature
description:
This game is inspired by Sam Hogan's "Grey Box Testing". I tried to take his idea of having intentional bugs and go one step further in the sense that once a player uses a bug to progress, the game "fixes" said bug.

This is my first completed project, so it won't be perfect. Some of the mechanics might be a little janky and not everything might be as clear as I thought. So sorry in advance. Any feedback is welcome and is much appreciated, as I hope to improve for future projects

Big thanks to everyone who helped test this game and provided feedback.
